testimonials.content: What makes Rami special (and much more than just a technician) is his ability to see the big picture, articulate responses, intuitively understand business needs, and educate his clients along the way.
testimonials.name: Paul
testimonials.title: Web Director & Support Client

testimonials.content: I have worked with Ram on three different websites and his professionalism and creativity in the process as well as organization along the way were keys in making the projects successful.
testimonials.name: Dustin
testimonials.title: Client

testimonials.content: He makes the production process comfortable and easy going while at the same time staying focused and detail oriented. His honest approach, great attitude and vast web/graphic design skillset makes him a valuable asset in whatever project he does.
testimonials.name: Charles
testimonials.title: Director of Communications

testimonials.content: Rami is a consummate professional, and a highly skilled front end HTML & CSS developer ... When it comes to accurate and lean language, there is none more proficient and precise than Rami.
testimonials.name: Christopher
testimonials.title: Director of UX Design | Colleague

testimonials.content: The code for this site is extremely clean.  I very rarely see sites in this space that look like they were written by a software engineer, but this one does. We would save a great deal of time if all of our customers had sites that were as easy to work with as this one is.
testimonials.name: David
testimonials.title: Senior Lead Software and Database Engineer
